features.title: Features

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team of Egyptians passionate about providing free education for every student
about.heroSubtitle: A team of passionate Egyptian youth making education accessible and free for everyone
about.missionDescription: We believe that education is a fundamental right for every Egyptian student. We work to break down financial and geographical barriers that prevent students from accessing high-quality education.
about.missionPoint1Description: No hidden fees, no subscriptions, truly free education
about.missionPoint2Description: From Aswan to Alexandria, education is available for every student
about.missionPoint3Description: Live and interactive lessons with the best teachers
about.storyPhase1Description: The idea started from a small group of developers who struggled to access quality education
about.storyPhase2Description: We launched a beta version with 100 students and 10 volunteer teachers
about.storyPhase3Description: We reached thousands of students across all governorates and doubled the number of teachers
about.storyPhase4Description: We aspire to reach every Egyptian student and provide world-class education
about.teamSubtitle: A group of passionate Egyptian youth dedicated to making a real change in education
about.valueInnovationDescription: We always seek new and innovative ways to improve the learning experience
about.valueEqualityDescription: We believe in every student's right to access excellent education regardless of their circumstances
about.valueQualityDescription: We strive to deliver high-quality educational content that meets global standards
about.valuePassionDescription: We work with passion and love to help students achieve their dreams
about.ctaTitle: Join Us in the Journey of Change
about.ctaDescription: Whether you're a student, teacher, or parent, you can be part of this journey

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions
faq.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive answers to all your questions
faq.searchPlaceholder: Search for a question or topic...
faq.noResultsDescription: Try searching with different keywords or browse categories
faq.needHelpTitle: Didn't Find What You're Looking For?
faq.needHelpSubtitle: Support team ready to help you

faqItems.question: Is the platform really free?
faqItems.answer: Yes, the platform is 100% free with no hidden fees or paid subscriptions. We are committed to providing free education to all Egyptian students.

faqItems.question: What's the difference between student, teacher, and parent?
faqItems.answer:
Student: Can attend lectures, take exams, and earn points.
Teacher: Can create and manage lectures and exams.
Parent: Can monitor their children's performance and attendance.

faqItems.question: Can I use the platform on mobile?
faqItems.answer: Yes, the platform is fully compatible with all devices. You can access it through your phone's browser, and soon there will be dedicated Android and iOS apps.

faqItems.question: How do I register on the platform?
faqItems.answer:
You can easily register by:
1. Clicking the "Join for Free" button
2. Selecting your account type (student/teacher/parent)
3. Entering the required information
4. Confirming your email

faqItems.question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
faqItems.answer:
Don't worry! You can recover your password by:
1. Clicking "Forgot Password" on the login page
2. Entering your email
3. You'll receive a message with a link to reset your password

faqItems.question: Can I change my account type from student to teacher?
faqItems.answer: Yes, you can apply to change your account type through account settings. Your request will be reviewed and required documents for teachers will be verified.

faqItems.question: What are the internet requirements for live streaming?
faqItems.answer:
For the best experience:
• Minimum: 2 Mbps for standard quality viewing
• Recommended: 5 Mbps for HD viewing
• For teachers: 10 Mbps for streaming

faqItems.question: The lecture isn't working well, what's the solution?
faqItems.answer:
Try the following steps:
1. Check your internet speed
2. Close other applications
3. Use Chrome or Firefox browser
4. Lower the stream quality in settings
5. Contact technical support if the problem persists

faqItems.question: How does the points system work?
faqItems.answer:
You earn points through:
• Attending lectures: 10 points
• Active participation: 5 points
• Completing assignments: 15 points
• Passing exams: 20-50 points
Points can be redeemed for additional benefits like private sessions or extra learning materials.

faqItems.question: Can I watch recorded lectures?
faqItems.answer: Yes, all live lectures are automatically recorded and available for viewing for 30 days after broadcast. You can access them from the "My Lectures" section.

faqItems.question: What educational stages are available?
faqItems.answer:
We cover all educational stages:
• Primary school (1-6)
• Preparatory school (1-3)
• Secondary school (1-3)
• University preparation courses

faqItems.question: Can a parent monitor more than one student?
faqItems.answer: Yes, a parent can link their account to multiple student accounts (their children) and monitor each one's performance separately from one control panel.

faqItems.question: Can I download lectures for offline viewing?
faqItems.answer: Currently, lectures cannot be downloaded, but we're working on adding this feature soon for premium students who collect a certain number of points.

faqItems.question: How are exams graded?
faqItems.answer:
Exams have different types:
• Multiple choice: Instant grading
• Essay questions: Reviewed by teacher within 48 hours
• Projects: Comprehensive evaluation within one week

faqItems.question: Are there any hidden costs?
faqItems.answer: No, the platform is completely free. There are no fees for registration, attending lectures, or taking exams. Even certificates are free!

faqItems.question: How can I support the platform if I want to?
faqItems.answer:
We appreciate your willingness to support! You can:
• Share the platform with your friends
• Volunteer as a teacher if qualified
• Donate through the support page (completely optional)
